votes_available.description: Number of votes user can currently cast

referrals_count.description: Number of successful referrals made by the user

badges.description: Array of badges earned by the user (e.g., ["First Steps", "Voter"])

password_hash.description: Placeholder to indicate a password was set during signup. Not used for authentication.

active.description: Whether feature is in current voting round

user_id.description: ID of user who voted (references users_v2.id)

feature_id.description: ID of feature voted for (references features_v2.id)

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the vote was cast

user_id.description: ID of user who suggested the feature (references users_v2.id)

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the suggestion was made

database.instructions: This database stores user accounts (users_v2), feature proposals for voting (features_v2), user votes (votes_v2), and feature suggestions (feature_suggestions_v2). Users can vote on active features and suggest new ones. User data (ID, username) is sourced from Websim. Votes available and other user stats are managed within users_v2.
